   19: %%
   20: -module(zlc_no_copt_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   25:          basic/1,mixed_zlc/1,zmc/1,filter_guard/1,
   26:          filter_pattern/1,cartesian/1,nomatch/1,bad_generators/1]).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: 
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   32:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group,p}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   39:       [basic,
   40:        mixed_zlc,
   41:        zmc,
   42:        filter_guard,
   43:        filter_pattern,
   44:        cartesian,
   45:        nomatch,
   46:        bad_generators
   47:       ]}].
   48: 
   49: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   50:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   70:     [6, 7, 8] = [X + Y + Z || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   71:     [{1, 2, 3}, {2, 2, 3}, {3, 2, 3}] =
   72:         [{X, Y, Z} || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   73:     [6, 24] = zipwith4(fun(A, B, C, D) -> (A + B + C) * D end,
   74:                        [1, 5], [2, 2], [0, 1], [2, 3]),
   75:     96 = dot([1, 2, 3, 4], [24, 12, 8, 6]),
   76: 
   77:     [1, 4, 5] = ifelse([true, false, true], [1, 3, 5], [2, 4, 6]),
   78: 
   79:     [8, 14, 20] = [X + Y + Z || <<X>> <= <<5, 10, 15>> && <<Y>> <= <<1, 2, 3>>
   80:                                     && <<Z>> <= <<2, 2, 2>>].
   81: 
   82: 
   83: zipwith4(F, As, Bs, Cs, Ds) ->
   84:     [F(A,B,C,D) || A <- As && B <- Bs && C <- Cs && D <- Ds].
   85: 
   86: dot(Xs, Ys) ->
   87:     lists:sum([X*Y || X <- Xs && Y <- Ys]).
   88: 
   89: ifelse(Tests, Xs, Ys) -> % Simulate R's ifelse(,,)
   90:     [  case T of true -> X ; false -> Y end
   91:        || T <- Tests && X <- Xs && Y <- Ys
   92:     ].
   93: 
   94: mixed_zlc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   95:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
   96:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c]],
   97:     [{a,c,1,3}, {b,d,2,4}] = [{K1,K2,V1,V2}||
   98:                                  K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
   99:                                      K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered)],
  100:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] =
  101:         [{K1,V1,Y} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  102:                           <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  103:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] = [{K1,V1,Y} ||
  104:                              K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  105:                                  <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  106:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2]>>,
  107:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  108:                     X <- [1,2,3] &&
  109:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  110:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  111:                     <<X>> <= <<1,2,3>> &&
  112:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  113:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(V1+V2)/integer>> ||
  114:                     _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2, c=>3}, ordered) &&
  115:                         _K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  116:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3]},
  117:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>},
  118:     ok.
  119: 
  120: zmc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     [{a,b,1,3}] = [{K1, K2, V1, V2} || K1 := V1 <- #{a=>1} && K2 := V2 <- #{b=>3}],
  122:     Seq = lists:seq(1, 50),
  123:     M1 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  124:     M2 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- lists:seq(1,50)}, ordered),
  125:     true = [A * 4 || A <- Seq] =:=
  126:         [X+Y+Z+W || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2],
  127:     true = << <<(A * 4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  128:         << <<(X+Y+Z+W):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2>>,
  129: 
  130:     M3 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X*3 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  131:     M4 = maps:iterator(#{X*2=>X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  132:     true = [{A, A*3, A*2, A*4} || A <- Seq] =:=
  133:         [{X, Y, Z, W} || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4],
  134:     true = [A * 3 || A <- Seq] =:= [X+Y+Z || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq],
  135:     true = << <<A:64, (A*3):64, (A*2):64, (A*4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  136:         << <<X:64, Y:64, Z:64, W:64>> || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4>>,
  137:     true = << <<(A*3):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  138:         << <<(X+Y+Z):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq>>,
  139: 
  140:     M5 = maps:iterator(#{X =>
  141:                              case X rem 2 of
  142:                                  0 -> {ok,X};
  143:                                  1 -> {error,X}
  144:                              end || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  145:     M6 = maps:iterator(#{X*2 => X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  146:     [] = [X || {{X,{ok,X}}, {_,X}} <- lists:zip(maps:to_list(M5), maps:to_list(M6))],
  147:     [] = [X || X := {ok,X} <- M5 && _ := X <- M6],
  148:     [] = [X || X := {e,X} <- M5 && X := {ok,X} <- M5],
  149:     ok.
  150: 
  151: filter_guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  152:     [[1,2,1]] = [X++Y || X <- [[1,2], [2,-3]] && Y <- [[1], [2]], lists:sum(X)>0],
  153:     [{a,2}, {b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>,
  154:                                       Y rem 2 == 0],
  155:     [{b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X, Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y =/= 2],
  156:     [] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y rem 2 == 1],
  157:     [{b,4}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c], X>a, X<c],
  158:     [{b,d,2}] = [{K1,K2,V1} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  159:                                    K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered),
  160:                                V2 rem 2 == 0],
  161:     <<5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2], X rem 2 == 1, X+Y>4>>,
  162:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1},
  163:     #{c := 3} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1, Y > 1},
  164:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>, Y rem 2 == 1}.
  165: 
  166: filter_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  167:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([], []),
  168:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([a], [a]),
  169:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([{ok,a}], [{error,e}]),
  170:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([], []),
  171:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([a], [b]),
  172:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{b,1}]),
  173:     [{1,7}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{a,7}]),
  174:     [{1,7},{10,20}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1},{b,9},{x,10}],
  175:                                       [{a,7},{wrong,8},{x,20}]),
  176:     ok.
  177: do_filter_pat_1(L1, L2) ->
  178:     Res = [{A,B} || {ok,A} <- L1 && {ok,B} <- L2],
  179:     Res = [{A,B} || {{ok,A},{ok,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  180:     Res.
  181: do_filter_pat_2(L1, L2) ->
  182:     Res = [{A,B} || {Same,A} <- L1 && {Same,B} <- L2],
  183:     Res = [{A,B} || {{Same,A},{Same,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  184:     Res.
  185: 
  186: cartesian(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  187:     [{a,3}, {b,5}, {c,7}, {a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  188:         [{X, W+Y} || W <- [1,2],
  189:                      X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
  190:     [{a,3}, {a,4}, {b,5}, {b,6}, {c,7}, {c,8}] =
  191:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  192:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2]],
  193:     [{a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  194:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  195:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2], (W + Y) rem 2 == 0],
  196:     <<4,2,5,3,6,4>> = << <<(X+V1+Y)/integer>> ||
  197:                           X <- [1,2,3] &&
  198:                               _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered),
  199:                           <<Y>> <= <<1,-1>> >>,
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: nomatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  203:     [] = do_nomatch_1([], []),
  204:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1], [a]),
  205:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1,2], [a,b]),
  206:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[1,2,3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], []),
  207:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], [a,b]),
  208: 
  209:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([], <<>>),
  210:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([a], <<1>>),
  211:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[2],<<>>}},_}} = do_nomatch_2([1,2], <<3>>),
  212:     ok.
  213: 
  214: do_nomatch_1(L1, L2) ->
  215:     catch [{X, Y} || a=b=X <- L1 && Y <- L2].
  216: 
  217: do_nomatch_2(L, Bin) ->
  218:     catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || a=b=X <- L && <<Y>> <= Bin >>.
  219: 
  220: bad_generators(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  221:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{x,[1,2]}},_}} =
  222:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- x && Y <- [1,2]],
  223:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[4]}},_}} =
  224:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [1,2,3,4]],
  225:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  226:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3],
  227:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  228:         catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3>>,
  229:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<1,2>>,a}},_}} =
  230:         catch << <<X:16>> || <<X:16>> <= <<1:8,2:8>> && <<X:8>> <= a>>,
  231:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},_}} = catch [X || X := X <- a && _Y <- [1]],
  232:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[d],[]}},_}} =
  233:         catch #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c,d] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y > 1},
  234: 
  235:     %% Make sure that line numbers point out the generator.
  236:     case ?MODULE of
  237:         zlc_inline_SUITE ->
  238:             %% No inline suite for now. Just a guard in case we add it later.
  239:             ok;
  240:         _ ->
  241:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[4]}},
  242:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  243:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  244:                 catch bad_generators([1,2,3],[1,2,3,4]),
  245: 
  246:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{a,[2,3]}},
  247:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  248:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  249:                 catch bad_generators_bc(a,[2,3]),
  250: 
  251:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[2],[]}},
  252:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  253:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  254:                 catch bad_generators_mc([1,2],[1]),
  255: 
  256:             %% List comprehensions with improper lists.
  257:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{d,[d]}},
  258:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  259:                        [{file,"bad_zlc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  260:                 catch bad_generators([a,b,c|d],[a,b,c,d])
  261:     end,
  262:     ok.
  263: 
  264: -file("bad_zlc.erl", 1).
  265: bad_generators(L1,L2) ->                        %Line 2
  266:     [{I1, I2} ||                                %Line 3
  267:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2].                  %Line 4
  268: bad_generators_bc(L1,L2) ->                     %Line 5
  269:     << <<I1:4,I2:4>> ||                         %Line 6
  270:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2>>.                 %Line 7
  271: bad_generators_mc(L1,L2) ->                     %Line 8
  272:     #{I1 => I2 ||                               %Line 9
  273:         I1 <- L1 && I2 <- L2}.                  %Line 10
